title: LF people to troll with
body: idc what rank im just bored man add me ill play supp

replies.body: Hello FoxxyGramma, if you are looking for some League players to queue up with come check out The Chaos Vanguard at http://thechaosvanguard.co.uk/ we have varying skill level and ranking. Look forward to seeing you on the Rift!
That sounds fun but I'm looking for people to play with on league not champions
I main support singed with smite
Only garen support. Thank me later. Tilt your ADC, tilt the other team, tilt everyone, win.
